casebody.data:
<casebody firstpage="418" lastpage="418" xmlns="http://nrs.harvard.edu/urn-3:HLS.Libr.US_Case_Law.Schema.Case_Body:v1">
<parties id="p-1">
  In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Robert Lee STONE.
 </parties>
<docketnumber id="p-2">
  No. D-2935.
 </docketnumber>
<court id="p-3">
  Supreme Court of the United States
 </court>
<decisiondate id="p-4">
  Oct. 31, 2016.
 </decisiondate>
<opinion id="p-5">
  Robert Lee Stone, of Chicago, Illinois, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
 </opinion>

</casebody>
